languages.text: "Мы сейчас что, торгуемся за информацию с этим отребьем? Долг любого серфа — безвозмездно помогать Вольному Торговцу и {rt_mf|его|ее} приближенным!"

traits.locale_text: "Мы сейчас что, торгуемся за информацию с этим отребьем? Долг любого серва — безвозмездно помогать Вольному Торговцу и его приближенным!"

languages.text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"
languages.original_text: "Мы сейчас что, торгуемся за информацию с этим отребьем? Долг любого серфа — безвозмездно помогать Вольному Торговцу и {rt_mf|его|ее} приближенным!"

traits.locale_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} associates at no charge!"
"Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} associates at no charge!"
"Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} associates at no charge!"
"Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} associates at no charge!"
"Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"
"Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"

languages.text: "Feilschen wir jetzt mit diesem Abschaum um Informationen? Es ist die Pflicht eines jeden Sklaven, {rt_mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und {rt_mf|seinen|ihren} Verbündeten zu helfen, aus freien Stücken und willentlich!"
languages.original_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"

traits.locale_text: "Feilschen wir jetzt mit diesem Abschaum um Informationen? Es ist die Pflicht eines jeden Sklaven, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und {mf|seinen|ihren} Verbündeten zu helfen, aus freien Stücken und willentlich!"

languages.text: «¿Ahora negociamos para obtener información de esta chusma? Es el deber de todo sirviente ayudar a su Comerciante Independiente y a sus ayudantes, ¡de forma gratuita y voluntaria!».
languages.original_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ahora negociamos para obtener información de esta chusma? Es el deber de todo sirviente ayudar a su Comerciante Independiente y a sus ayudantes, ¡de forma gratuita y voluntaria!».

languages.text: 「このゲス野郎と情報の駆け引きをしているのか？ローグトレーダーやその仲間を、自由意思で、進んで助けるのはすべての農奴の義務んなんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"

traits.locale_text: 「このゲス野郎と情報の駆け引きをしているのか？ローグトレーダーやその仲間を、自由意思で、進んで助けるのはすべての農奴の義務んなんだ！」

languages.text: “我们是要和这个卑贱的家伙讨价还价吗？每个仆役都有义务协助行商浪人和{rt_mf|他|她}的伙伴！完全自愿，不图回报！”
languages.original_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"

traits.locale_text: “我们是要和这个卑贱的家伙讨价还价吗？每个仆役都有义务协助行商浪人和{mf|他|她}的伙伴！完全自愿，不图回报！”

languages.text: « En serions-nous réduits à marchander avec cette crapule ? Il est du devoir de chaque serf d'aider {rt_mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et ses associés ! »
languages.original_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"

traits.locale_text: « En serions-nous réduits à marchander avec cette crapule ? Il est du devoir de chaque serf d'aider {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et ses associés ! »

languages.text: "Bu alçakla bilgi pazarlığı mı yapacakmışız? Hür Tacir ile ortaklarına özgürce ve istekle yardım etmek, tüm kölelerin vazifesidir!"
languages.original_text: "Are we bargaining for information with this lowlife now? It is the duty of every serf to aid the Rogue Trader and {rt_mf|his|her} associates, freely and willingly!"
